0: 63 yo retired neurologist with history of hypertension and osteoarthritis who presented for a left total knee replacement who was transferred to the [**Hospital Unit Name 153**] for pain control and episodes of apnea and desaturations. He remained stable overnight and was transfered to the floor in stable condition. Epidural catheter was removed and he was started on lovenox and percocet. He continued to work with PT and will be d/c to home with services in stable condition.
